description: This chapter describes Jonah's prayer from within the fish's belly and the LORD's command to the fish to vomit Jonah upon the dry land.

questions.question: Where did Jonah pray unto the LORD his God?
Where did Jonah cry unto the LORD?
What did the LORD do when Jonah cried?
Where did Jonah cry from?
options: Out of the belly of hell

questions.question: What did the LORD hear?
Where had the LORD cast Jonah?
options: Into the deep, in the midst of the seas

questions.question: What compassed Jonah about?
What passed over Jonah?
options: All thy billows and thy waves

questions.question: What did Jonah say about being cast out?
options: I am cast out of thy sight
I am cast out of thy presence
I am cast out of thy holy temple
I am cast out of thy people

questions.question: What did Jonah say he would look toward?
options: Yet I will look again toward thy holy temple
Yet I will look again toward thy presence
Yet I will look again toward thy grace
Yet I will look again toward thy salvation

questions.question: How far did the waters compass Jonah about?
What was wrapped about Jonah's head?
options: The weeds were wrapped about my head

questions.question: Where did Jonah go down to?
options: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains
To the depths of the sea
To the center of the earth

questions.question: What was about Jonah for ever?
options: The earth with her bars was about me for ever

questions.question: What did the LORD bring up from corruption?
options: Yet hast thou brought up my life from corruption
Yet hast thou brought up my body from corruption
Yet hast thou brought up my soul from corruption
Yet hast thou brought up my spirit from corruption

questions.question: When Jonah's soul fainted within him, what did he remember?
Where did Jonah's prayer come in unto?
How did Jonah say he would sacrifice unto the LORD?
Who did Jonah say salvation is of?
What did the LORD command the fish to do?
options: It vomited out Jonah upon the dry land
It took Jonah to the ship
It took Jonah to the sea
